message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business. Given its high value and potential impact, I propose a price of $1400000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1250000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I am unable to accept it. I am proposing a new price of $1350000 for the product, which I believe reflects its true value and benefits for your business.
I appreciate your response, Alice. I'm willing to consider an offer closer to my budget. My counteroffer for the product is $1300000.
Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to negotiate further. I am now offering the product at $1325000.
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget and the current market situation, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1300000 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your continued interest in our product. I am now offering the product at $1330000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort in negotiating. I would like to counteroffer at $1320000 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to come to a compromise. I am now offering the product at $1325000.
